name: Mnhaon
body:
## PROJECT TITLE:  
mnhaon

## PURPOSE OF PROJECT: 
To teach my kid how to code and share that code:

The constraints that we will try to follow...
- The source must be shared via github and in a compiled playable format with in two weeks.
- The focus will be on creating, experiencing and sharing code not the framework or deep syntax itself (so we will be using greenfoot, gosu or something like them).
- The two students will write all of the code using XP and scrum with an occasional booster script from me
- The two students provide all of the content: music, graphics, story and code
- We will have fun

## VERSION or DATE:  
09/19/2011

## HOW TO START THIS PROJECT:  
Install green foot from greenfoot.org (needs java)

## AUTHORS:  
Caden Floyd, Jonah Floyd

## USER INSTRUCTIONS:  
n/a

More information: http://archcoder.com/articles/20110915/kid-gamification-planning
Subscribe to the project: http://archcoder.com/taxonomy/term/8/0/feed
tagline: The epic journey of a family of turtles just trying to get home
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
